files.provenance/PROVENANCE.md:
# Provenance

- All methodology rules are extracted from official sources. Each check in `rules.json` cites `sections.json#section_id` and a PDF page.
- On version bumps, update `META.json` (methodology_version, source_docs SHA-256) and `registry/registry.json`.
- Determinism: reports must follow `contracts/compliance-report.v1.json`; same inputs â†’ same bytes.
files.provenance/SOURCES.md:
# Sources

List official PDFs for each methodology and their SHA-256 (computed via `tools/compute-hash.mjs`). Keep copies in `methodologies/<CODE>/source_pdfs/` when allowed, or store URLs + hashes only.
files.docs/GOVERNANCE.md:
# Repository Governance

- **Branch protection**: PRs only to `main`, status checks required (validate.yml), CODEOWNERS review required.
- **Commits**: Conventional Commits + DCO line. Prefer rebase over merge. Use `--force-with-lease` only on PR branches.
- **Node**: v20 per `.nvmrc`; keep `package-lock.json` in sync with `package.json`.
files.docs/METHODOLOGY_PACK.md:
# Methodology Pack Structure

```
methodologies/<CODE>/
  rules.json        # machine-readable checks; each check cites sections.json + page
  META.json         # versioning + source_docs SHA-256
  sections.json     # human-readable outline; stable section ids
  overrides/        # country-specific overrides (optional)
  source_pdfs/      # source docs (if redistributable) or placeholder
  tools/            # pack-local utilities (optional)
```
files..github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml:
name: Bug report
description: Report a problem with schemas, rules, CI, or outputs
labels: [bug]
body:
  - type: textarea
    id: what
    attributes:
      label: What happened?
      description: Describe the issue
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: input
    id: sha
    attributes:
      label: Commit SHA / PR link
  - type: textarea
    id: steps
    attributes:
      label: Steps to reproduce
  - type: textarea
    id: logs
    attributes:
      label: Logs / CI output
files..github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.y:
name: Feature request
description: Propose a new methodology or guardrail
labels: [enhancement]
body:
  - type: input
    id: scope
    attributes:
      label: Scope
      description: What should be added/changed?
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    id: rationale
    attributes:
      label: Why
      description: Why is this needed? Impact on compliance/auditability.
  - type: textarea
    id: deliverables
    attributes:
      label: Deliverables
      description: Files/endpoints to create or modify
